thread.title: 7 ways to ring in the new year
thread.title_full: 7 ways to ring in the new year

author: Kelsey Shoemaker
title: 7 ways to ring in the new year
text:
As 2023 approaches its final days, what better way to bid farewell to it than in style?
We’ve curated the top places to ring in the midnight hour and enjoy our neighborhood’s first day of the new year. There’s something for everyone, from themed galas and feasts to parties and even cooldowns for the next day. So, grab the champagne, gather your friends and join us at midnight.
1. Shops at Park Lane
Bar Louie at Shops at Park Lane has an evening fit for the whole crew. Enjoy a four-course dinner featuring truffle mushroom, French onion soup, New Orleans chicken and shrimp pasta, steak frites, chocolate cake and more delicious options. Guests can enjoy a late night celebration featuring shareable appetizers and a midnight champagne toast.
2. New Year at José
Bid farewell to the year at José’s
 New Year’s Eve Brunch on Sunday, Dec. 31 from 10 a.m. to noon. The buffet boasts favorite bites, brunch cocktails and additional festive offerings. José promises a seasonal experience.
3. Eataly
Join the celebration at
Eataly Dallas in NorthPark Center as they welcome in 2024 with light bites and bubbly. The event starts at 5 p.m. (midnight in Italy) and includes a midnight toast. For tickets and more information visit their website.
4. Great Gatsby near Love Field
Embrace the glitz and glamour of New Year’s at the Great Gatsby-themed gala held at Love Field’s Marriott Aloft. The event will include a Black Tie affair, an open bar, a midnight champagne toast, live music from celebrity DJs and
more.
5. Thirsty Lion Gastropub
Thirsty Lion, known for its seasonal experiences, prepares for the holidays with another special
menu. It includes black cherry barbecue pork tenderloin, grilled ribeye steak, espresso martini and other favorites. Reservations can be made on their website.
6. The Stache
Step back in time at the
Stache for a stylish end to the year with crafted cocktails and a unique speakeasy celebration.
7. Blue Sushi Sake Grill
Continue the festivities into the next day at
Blue Sushi Sake Grill, hosting an all-day Happy Hour on Monday, January 1, 2024, to celebrate New Year’s Day.
